page.title: 13FAMILY CHURCH SERVICE
page.content: { Once a month a family service is held at Ulley Church.This service is taken by a retired curate.We were greeted by Mrs Lovely the local farmers wife,who is also the Sunday School teacher.She gave us an hymn and prayer book and we sat in the middle of the church.The service began with a hymn and was accompanied by the organist.The service was very pleasant and the theme was about Love and all that love means and entails.The sermon was interesting and the hour and twenty minutes that we spent in the church passed very quickly.The service ended with Holy Communion which most of the adults took part in by going up to the altar to take the bread and wine.We children also went up to the altar for a blessing.After the service we were invited for refreshments.
